Demographics: 55,600,000 in United Kingdom (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 335,148,868. L2 users: 1,500,000 in United Kingdom (Crystal 2003). L2 users worldwide: 505,000,000.
60,000,000 in France (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 74,980,460.
10,400,000 in Czech Republic (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 10,619,340.
137,000,000 in Russian Federation (2010 census). Population total all countries: 167,332,230.
1,470,000 in Latvia (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 1,552,260. L2 users: 497,000 in Latvia (ELDIA 2012).
